Name: Hattusha
Description: Hattusha: the Hittite Capital - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ancient capital of the Hittite Empire with well-preserved ruins.

Name: Nemrut Dağ
Description: Nemrut Dağ - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Mountaintop sanctuary with colossal statues from the 1st century BCE.

Name: Xanthos-Letoon
Description: Xanthos-Letoon - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ancient Lycian cities with important archaeological remains.

Name: Hierapolis-Pamukkale
Description: Hierapolis-Pamukkale - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ancient spa city with white travertine terraces and thermal springs.

Name: City of Safranbolu
Description: City of Safranbolu - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Well-preserved Ottoman town with traditional architecture.

Name: Archaeological Site of Troy
Description: Archaeological Site of Troy - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ancient city famous from Homer's Iliad.

Name: Selimiye Mosque
Description: Selimiye Mosque and its Social Complex - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Masterpiece of Ottoman architecture by Mimar Sinan.

Name: Neolithic Site of Çatalhöyük
Description: Neolithic Site of Çatalhöyük - UNESCO World Heritage Site. One of the most important Neolithic settlements in the world.

Name: Pergamon
Description: Pergamon and its Multi-Layered Cultural Landscape - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ancient Greek city with impressive ruins.

Name: Bursa and Cumalıkızık
Description: Bursa and Cumalıkızık: the Birth of the Ottoman Empire - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Early Ottoman capital with traditional village.

Name: Ephesus
Description: Ephesus - UNESCO World Heritage Site. One of the best-preserved ancient cities in the Mediterranean.

Name: Great Mosque and Hospital of Divriği
Description: Great Mosque and Hospital of Divriği - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Unique Seljuk architecture with intricate stone carvings.

Name: Göreme National Park
Description: Göreme National Park and the Rock Sites of Cappadocia - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Unique rock formations and cave dwellings.

Name: Historic Areas of Istanbul
Description: Historic Areas of Istanbul - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Historic peninsula with Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, and Topkapi Palace.

Name: Diyarbakır Fortress
Description: Diyarbakır Fortress and Hevsel Gardens Cultural Landscape - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ancient fortress and gardens.

Name: Archaeological Site of Ani
Description: Archaeological Site of Ani - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Medieval Armenian city with impressive ruins.

Name: Aphrodisias
Description: Aphrodisias - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ancient Greek city dedicated to the goddess Aphrodite.

Name: Göbekli Tepe
Description: Göbekli Tepe - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Prehistoric temple complex dating back 11,000 years.

Name: Arslantepe Mound
Description: Arslantepe Mound - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Archaeological site with evidence of early state formation.

Name: Gordion
Description: Gordion - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ancient Phrygian capital associated with King Midas.
